head.title: no-empty-first-line

body:
#no-empty-first-line

Disallow empty first lines.

    \n
    /** ↑
     * This newline */
    a { color: pink; }

This rule ignores empty sources. Use the no-empty-source rule to disallow these.

The --fix option on the command line can automatically fix all of the problems reported by this rule.

#Options

#true

The following patterns are considered violations:

\n
a { color: pink; }

The following patterns are not considered violations:

a { color: pink; }
